title: Treasury Secretary: Boosting World Economy Requires 'Tough Decisions'
teaser: Robert Siegel talks with U.S. Treasury Secretary Jack Lew ahead of the G-20 summit in Australia. If Asia and Europe don't pick up some economic steam, Lew says, it could spell trouble for the U.S.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
